column2: otu.unweighted.samp <- xtabs(~ item + sample_day , data = otu.unweighted.samp)##how often consumed/d
otu.unweighted.samp <- pivot_wider(data = otu.unweighted.samp, names_from = 'item', values_from = 'Freq') %>% as.data.frame(.)
pd.conv.samp <- pd(samp = otu.unweighted.samp,tree = tree.conv)##phylogenetic diversity,specy richness
geom_col(aes(x = samples, y = SR, fill = stringr::str_sub(samples, -2, -1))) +
